channel.title: How do i make a powerful POWERFUL WEP!
channel.description: on this wep i want to change all the bonuses to 10000+ how do i do that

item.title: How do i make a powerful POWERFUL WEP!
item.dc:creator: @lil_wayne612 lil wayne612
item.source: How do i make a powerful POWERFUL WEP!

item.title: How do i make a powerful POWERFUL WEP!
item.dc:creator: @God_Of_Love God Of Love
item.description:
@God_Of_Love wrote:

Look for the folder ‘item.cfg’
Open it up - Once you have opened it, press Ctrl + F and type in either the code or name of the weapon you would like to edit.
Once you have found it you will see something like this

item = 1377	Dragon_battleaxe	A_vicious_looking_axe.	119674.606536637	119674.606536637	159810.333148737	-2	70	65	-50	0	0	0	0	0	-1	85	0

The bit where it says 85 (this is only for dragon battleaxe) But, the second from last digit is the Str Bonus, You can edit all the digits to make it really powerfull, But for the Str bonus its the second from last.

~God Of Love

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a powerful POWERFUL WEP!

this is easy …what u need to do is go to

in ur server folder where u she the characeters folder…look for data…then when in data…look 4 items.cfg…then change all teh 0 to the number u want…the compile and run

ps dont need to touch teh 1st 2 number that just the price that the shop willl by and sell 4
